page.title: 18FAMILY LIFE
page.content: My name is Paula Knox.This is a typical weekend in my life.I am the second eldest in my family of four girls.My sisters names are Jennifer Claire and Lindsay .On saturday we watched T.V. while mum made the breakfast-cornflakes and tea or coffee.My dad works on a saturday morning.He is a draughtsman.He came home at twelve o'clock we helped mum with the housework while he cut the grass.After lunch Jennifer and I went out to do the shopping.The two younger sisters played in the garden and mum planted flowers.Dad was working on the car.My auntie Carol Anne gave us a lift home in her new car.We played for a while then went in to set the table for dinner we had chips,sweetcorn, pineapple and gammon steaks.Later on some of my relations visited us so I went up stairs to watch Dynasty.
